metadata.dc:author: Gil Tutor, E
metadata.dc:description: We present 2 cases of mixed Laryngocele of big size operated by lateral cervical approach. Owing to the bulging inward of the laryngeal surface an urgent tracheostomy would be done in each case. No associated malignancy was verified in the resected piece, nevertheless this possibility must be always distrusted.
metadata.dc:title: Laringoceles. Estudio clínico y terapéutico.
[Laryngoceles. Clinical and therapeutic study].
